name: WallStreetSlider
description:
Slide into the world of investing with WallStreetSlider. WallStreetSlider takes you on a journey through the history of the US stock market. Play and participate in the major stock market events of the past century. Can you turn a hundred into a million?

Features:
-10 levels based on real stock market events
-Basic information regarding the stock market
-Basic information on historical events such as the crash of 1929
-An epic soundtrack!
-A fun dive into the skill of investing!
-No Ads!
